title: 3 and Out - All-In Rams, Stafford/McVay Legacy, Kupp/Donald Dominance, Burrow Future, Dre/Snoop Crush, Winners/Losers
itunes:title: 3 and Out - All-In Rams, Stafford/McVay Legacy, Kupp/Donald Dominance, Burrow Future, Dre/Snoop Crush, Winners/Losers
description:
John gives his Rams/Bengals instant reaction, including why the Rams all-in approach paid off, what the win means for Sean McVay, why Cooper Kupp is already in the all-time wide receiver conversation, why the Von Miller trade was a massive win for the Rams, why Aaron Donald is one of the best ever, his take on the Dre/Snoop halftime show, and the biggest losers from the game, including St. Louis.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
